title: THE REGION;Irish Nationalist Led Into Canada
body:
One of five Irish nationalists arrested on Feb. 6 on charges of illegally trying to enter the United States from 
Canada was freed on $10,000 bail and escorted back across the border.

The man, 34-year-old Edward Howell of Belfast, was escorted across the Whirlpool Bridge by United States 
immigration authorities and taken into a Canadian customs building, where he was temporarily detained. Canadian 
immigration officials then took him to the Hamilton-Wentworth Detention Center at Hamilton, Ontario.
Edward Howell of Belfast, arrested on February 6 for illegally trying to enter US from Canada, is freed on $10,000 
bail and sent back to Canada
